member.name: DML_OPERATOR_DESC
member.summary: A generic container for an operator description. You construct DirectML operators using the parameters specified in this struct. See for additional details.

member.name: DML_OPERATOR_DESC.Type
member.summary: The type of the operator description. See DML_OPERATOR_TYPE for the available types.

member.name: DML_OPERATOR_DESC.Desc
member.summary: A pointer to the operator description. The type of the pointed-to struct must match the value specified in Type.
